Package com.intellij.openapi.editor.textarea

Interface TextComponentEditor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Editor, UserDataHolder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TextComponentEditorImpl

    public interface TextComponentEditor
extends Editor
    An implementation of Editor on top of a plain JTextComponent. The corresponding document (Editor.getDocument()) is a wrapper over Swing Document and doesn't require write action for modifications.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.intellij.openapi.editor.Editor
